text: Nikolay Matveyevich Goloded, Mikalaj Haladzied (; ; March 1894 – 1937) was a Belarusian Soviet statesman and first secretary of the Byelorussian SSR from December 1925 to May 1927. He served as a Prime Minister of the Byelorussian Soviet Socialist Republic from 1927 to May 30, 1937. He was arrested on June 14, 1937. title: Nikolay Goloded
